trans-unit.source: A trigger action that provides functionality for seeking (skipping) to a specified time within the active period of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供功能的作用中期間內的指定時間搜尋 （略過） 觸發程序動作<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use a SeekStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to seek a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: 搭配 SeekStoryboard 動作<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>或<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>要搜尋<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings into account: the storyboard is treated as though it had a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，搜尋作業不會分鏡腳本<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>設定納入考量︰ 分鏡腳本會被當成它<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>1 個和任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: Seeking a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> triggers its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.

Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 暫停、 繼續、 停止或否則控制項分鏡腳本以互動方式可以暫停、 繼續或控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>，以互動方式設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>屬性其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>並用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>物件 (例如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 來控制參考其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>並未指定，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>無法在之後開始時以互動方式控制。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[How to︰ 使用事件觸發程序來控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定腳本應該移動的數量向前或向後從搜尋原點<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>

trans-unit.source: A positive or negative value that specifies the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.
trans-unit.target: 正數或負數的值，指定移動的數量的分鏡腳本應該向前或向後從搜尋原點<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position from which this seek operation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個搜尋作業的位置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>套用。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>

trans-unit.source: The position from which this seek operation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> is applied.

Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> property of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>屬性這<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref>應該序列化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> property of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> should be serialized; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果<> *> 屬性這<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref>應該序列化，否則* *false**。
